self.name: contacts.blockFromReplies
self.description: Stop getting notifications about thread replies of a certain user in @replies
self.descriptionExcerpt: Stop getting notifications about thread replies of a certain user in @replies

arguments.name: deleteMessage
arguments.description: Whether to delete the specified message as well

arguments.name: deleteHistory
arguments.description: Whether to delete all @replies messages from this user as well

arguments.name: reportSpam
arguments.description: Whether to also report this user for spam

arguments.name: msgId
arguments.description: ID of the message in the @replies chat
